Pixel Launcher.More themed icons: Extends support for dynamic color themed icons for installed apps

Animations.Charging animation: Display an animation when the device is plugged in

Interface.Media cover art: Display media cover art when available
Interface.Charging stats: Display current, voltage, wattage, and temperature stats while charging
Interface.Pulse: Audio graphic equalizer for navigation bar and lock screen
Interface.Carrier name on lock screen: Display carrier name on lock screen status bar

Fingerprint.Ripple animation: Show ripple animation when unlocked with fingerprint
Fingerprint.Authentication success vibration: Vibrate when fingerprint authentication is successful

Gestures.Brightness control: Adjust brightness by swiping across the status bar
Gestures.Quick pull down: Pull down quicksettings with a single swipe

Icons.Status bar tuner: Choose which system icons can be shown
Icons.Network traffic monitor: Display and customize current network traffic levels
Icons.Battery percentage when charging: Always display battery percentage when charging
Icons.Logo: Display a custom logo on the status bar
Icons.Data disabled indicator: Display an indicator next to signal icon when data is disabled
Icons.Wi-Fi standard: Display Wi-Fi standard next the Wi-Fi icon
Icons.Bluetooth battery status: Display battery status for the connected Bluetooth device, if available

Privacy indicators.Microphone & camera: Display an indicator when an app accesses the microphone or camera
Privacy indicators.Location: Display an indicator when an app accesses your location
Privacy indicators.Screen projection: Display an indicator when the screen is being projected

Lock screen.Swipe down on LS to view QS: Enable or disable quicksettings on lockscreen

Miscellaneous.Bluetooth tile dialog: Show bluetooth dialog or toggle bluetooth state on tapping bluetooth tile

Heads up.Heads-up: Display priority notifications in a small floating window
Heads up.Less boring: Display popup notifications only for alarm, dialer and messaging app

Interface.Alert slider notifications: Display notification when changing alert slider position

Sounds & vibration.Alert while display on: Play sound and vibration for notifications while the display is on

Lock screen.Show on secure lock screen: Show the power menu while the device is locked

Spoofing.Component spoofing: Bypass app restrictions by spoofing components

Developer options.Hide applist: Prevent apps from checking selected apps from appslist
Developer options.USB configuration: Choose the default behavior when connected to a device via USB
Developer options.No storage restrict: Remove the restriction when selecting folders through Storage Access Framework. Can be convenient in some cases but may lead to privacy leaks.
Developer options.Ignore wallpaper dimming requests: Blocks all apps from setting the wallpaper dim
Developer options.Hide screen capture status: Hide screen capture/record status from apps. Useful but may risk privacy. Restart apps to apply.
Developer options.Allow application downgrade: Allow downgrading system applications, which may result in crashes and data loss
Developer options.Ignore window secure flags: Remove restrictions on screenshots and screen recordings for all applications, potentially risking privacy leaks
